entity28.description: A time standard used as a reference for setting local times around the world, established at the International Meridian Conference.

entity31.name: Prime Meridian
entity31.description: A meridian (line of longitude) at which longitude is defined to be 0Â°. It is used as a reference point for measuring time zones and geographical coordinates.

entity32.name: GMT
